actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution establishing a Select Committee on Procedures for Election of a President in the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Establishes a Select Committee on Procedures for Election of a President in the House of Representatives. Requires the select committee to report to the House by November 15, 1980, on the results of its investigation and study. Terminates such committee 30 days after the filing of such report or by January 3, 1981, whichever comes first.

titles.title: A resolution establishing a Select Committee on Procedures for Election of a President in the House of Representatives.
